MainTitleHeader
Council Member William Roth

SubTitleHeader
Cit​y Council District 11

Page Content

For more than 40 years, William Roth has called North Dallas home - raising his family, building a thriving small business, The William Roth Company, and volunteering in numerous civic and education organizations to improve the lives of fellow Dallasites. William Roth earned a bachelor's degree from George Washington University and a law degree from Southern Methodist University.

His civic background includes the following organizations:
  • President 2013
  • President Elect 2008 - 2011, 2015-2016
  • Vice President 1998 - 2002
  • Director 1996 - 2002, 2004 - 2005
  • President 2011 - 2014
  • President - 2006 - 2008
  • President Elect 2004 - 2005
  • Vice President 2002-2003
  • Director 1992-1995 / 2000 - 2001 / 2009 - 2013
  • Executive Committee 2000 - 2001
  • Resettlement Committee Chair 1994
  • Outstanding Volunteer Award Recipient 1999
  • Leadership Award 2001
  • Resource Development Award 2008
Bill Cooper Fund (Salesman Financial Assistance)
  • Director 2002 - 2014
City of Dallas, Texas
  • Housing Finance Corporation Board Member 2004 - 2005
  • Forward Dallas Advisory Committee Member 2004 - 2006
Nexus, Inc. (Rehab Center)
  • Director 1983 - 1987
  • Vice President 1987
  • Chairman, Building Committee 1986 - 1987
  • Director 1995 - 1997
  • Board of Education 1993 - 1994
  • Director 1988 - 1994, 2005
  • Treasurer 1993 - 1994
  • State Legislative Lobby Trips 1991/ 1993
  • Director 1992 - 1995, 1997 - 1999
  • Treasurer 1993 - 1995
  • Executive Committee 1997 - 2001
  • Member 1994 - 2005
  • Continuing Legal Education Program (DAYL) 1979
  • Member 1978 - Present
  • Jewish Community High School Director 2002 - 2003
  • JCRC State Legislative Lobby Trip 1989
  • Director 2006 - 2007

Address

1500 Marilla Street Dallas, TX 75201 Tel: 214-670-3111
